subject: Mental Health
title: Social Media and Body Image
description: A fast breakdown of Social Media and Body Image for builders.

hook.text: Thirty minutes on Instagram increases body dissatisfaction measurably in studies.

buildup.text: Filtered photos, edited bodies, and comparison culture flood social media feeds.

discovery.text: Meta's own leaked research showed Instagram worsened body image in teenage girls.

twist.text: Pro-eating-disorder communities thrive online, sharing tips disguised as motivation.

climax.text: Yet social media also hosts recovery communities that provide genuine support.

punchline.text: The same screen can poison or heal. The feed matters.

quiz.question: What did Meta's internal research reveal about Instagram?
options: It worsened body image in teenage girls
It had no effect on body image
